turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like three large pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one to be a Bacon Cheese Burrito pizza, if they have it. And then the other two I want Chicken, Bacon, and Ranch pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, is it possible to get one Taco pizza? Do they have Taco pizzas there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do not, but you can build your own if you know the ingredients.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Normal ride. I guess instead I'll have one Buffalo Chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so is that 4 large pizzas or did you want to switch out one of the Chicken Bacon Ranch pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, and I'd also like extra cheese on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you are ordering 3 large pizzas with extra cheese, 1 Bacon cheeseburger, 1 Chicken Bacon Ranch, and 1 Buffalo Chicken, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total will be $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like it delivered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is the delivery fee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is no set fee, but tips are appreciated by the drivers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be delivered within 50 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, enjoy your pizzas.
